system.requirements:
Tier 2; Intelligence 30
Aptitudes: Intelligence, Knowledge, Tzeentch
system.effect: Character can spend 10 minutes studying or analysing a problem to gain +10 to the next Intelligence Test or Intelligence-Based Skill Test they make relating to it.

description.value: Character can spend 10 minutes studying or analysing a problem to gain +10 to the next Intelligence Test or Intelligence-Based Skill Test they make relating to it.
